description: The Department of National Defence is seeking vendors to supply electrical cases for Iridium phones. The cases will be used by the Government of Canada for a specific purpose.
full_summary:
# Electrical Cases for Iridium Phones

### Tender Details

* **Reference Number:** #cb-259-19381184
* **Solicitation Number:** #W6369-240404/A
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2024-03-18, 14:00 MST
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** 2024-06-29
* **Expected Contract End Date:** 2027-06-28

### Tender Type

This is a Request for Standing Offer (RSFO) for the supply of Electrical Cases for Iridium Phones to the Canadian Armed Forces.

### Tender Requirements

* The tender must meet the specifications outlined in the tender documents.
* All tenderers must have the ability to meet the anticipated demand.
* The Canadian Armed Forces is seeking a Standing Offer from a qualified supplier.

### Trade Agreements

This tender is open to suppliers from countries participating in the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

### Region of Opportunity

The Canadian Armed Forces is seeking suppliers to provide Electrical Cases for Iridium Phones in Canada, specifically within the National Capital Region (NCR).

### Contact Information

For additional information, please contact:

Rachel Desjardins
Email: [rachel.desjardins@forces.gc.ca](mailto:rachel.desjardins@forces.gc.ca)
Phone: (613) 290-5359

Note: This tender is now closed for submissions.

### Access Tender Documents

Tender documents, including the RSFO and amendment documents, can be downloaded from the Get Verify Service Supplier (GVSS) system.

### Language

The tender documents are available in both English and French. RVA.

### Attachments

Please find the following tender documents attached:

* RAFSOW6369-240404 (Amendment 4)
